explains: adj. 无经验的；不熟练的

sentences.en: She is by no means an inexperienced teacher.
sentences.cn: 她绝不是个毫无经验的教师。

sentences.en: She was inexperienced and needed a guiding hand.
sentences.cn: 她缺乏经验，需要有人指导。

sentences.en: This feature is designed to aid inexperienced users.
sentences.cn: 这个特色是为帮助没有经验的用户而设计的。
